import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import abaLogo from "../../images/aba.png" import creditLogo from "../../images/credit.png" import Footer from "../Footer"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import Loading from "../Loading/Loading"; function PaymentPage() { const param = useParams() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const getProductDetail = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const respone = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${param.id}`, {}); const data = await respone.json(); setProduct(data) setLoading(false) } catch (error) { setLoading(false) console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { getProductDetail(); }, {}); if (loading) { return ( ) } return (

Choose Payment Methods

Scan to pay with ABA Mobile

Scan to pay with ABA Mobile

{product.title}
Order Summary

) } export default PaymentPage
